items.sentence: I had the impression Tom knew what was going on.
I have a friend whose father is a famous pianist.
I have three brothers who used to work in Boston.
I have to write a letter. Do you have some paper?
Tom has been seeing a psychiatrist since October.
Tom has finally paid back all his gambling debts.
Tom has never read the Bible from cover to cover.
Tom has written quite a few love letters to Mary.
Tom is a nice guy, except that he talks too much.
I can make a few calls for you if you want me to.
I can stay in the car while you go into the bank.
I can tell you if you promise not to tell anyone.
I can think of safer places to visit than Boston.
I can understand most of what Tom says in French.
You have to work harder to make up for lost time.
Are you saying that you don\'t think I can do it?
Are you saying you don\'t think that I can do it?
Are you sure Tom knows what he\'s supposed to do?
How many Christmas cards did you write last year?
I got up early in order to catch the first train.
